entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 26. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
